abstract: Palestinian man Zuhair Mohammed Hassan Khalid al-Abbasi is arrested in Jordan on charges he participated in deadly 1982 anti-Semitic attack on Chez Jo Goldenberg restaurant in Paris, which killed six people.
lead_paragraph: The suspect, who was arrested in Jordan, was accused of being the “supervisor” of the attack on Chez Jo Goldenberg, which killed six people.

headline.main: Palestinian Is Detained in ’82 Attack on Paris Jewish Restaurant
headline.print_headline: Palestinian Is Detained in ’82 Attack in France

snippet: The suspect, who was arrested in Jordan, was accused of being the “supervisor” of the attack on Chez Jo Goldenberg, which killed six people.
